features: Fun with additional benefits for your four-legged friend: SPORTSPET High Bounce Balls are designed to increase your dog's fitness, improve their reaction time, slow down eating behaviour and increase their motivation.

Durability: Made from a high-quality blend of natural and Japanese rubber, SPORTSPET High Bounce Balls offer long-lasting fun. So that it never ends, sign up for Subscribe & Save to always have enough supplies in case a ball is lost.
Let your four-legged friend decide: whether in the pool, sea, lake or on land - the SPORTSPET balls will become your furry nose's favourite in no time at all!
Dogs know what is good: The SPORTSPET High Bounce Balls awaken your dog's natural hunting instinct and are perfect for exciting fetch games that improve their agility and speed.

Safety first: At SPORTSPET the safety of your dog is important to us. Our products are durable but not indestructible - please use under supervision and sort out if damaged. Always make sure to choose the right ball size for your dog.
description: Give your dog endless joy with SPORTSPET’s High Bounce Dog Balls, expertly crafted from a unique blend of premium natural and Japanese rubbers. These dog toy balls offer an unmatched combination of bounce, durability, and safety, making them perfect for any dog who loves to fetch, chew, or play. Built to withstand even the most enthusiastic playtime, these balls are designed to last. Our proprietary rubber blend ensures that these puppy balls are not only fun but also incredibly resilient. Whether you have a small puppy or a large, aggressive chewer, our dog balls are designed to handle it all, delivering consistent bounce and durability for dogs of all sizes and energy levels. The standard 60mm size is ideal for small to medium dogs, offering the perfect fit for their playful needs. At SPORTSPET, safety is our top priority. Every ball in our range undergoes rigorous testing, meeting both sports play and children's toy standards. We’ve taken extra care to ensure our balls are free from harmful chemicals like paraffins and polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs), so your dog can safely chew, slobber, and play without any risks. Never lose sight of your pet's favorite toy again with our High Bounce Balls, available in high-visibility colors. These vibrant colors make it easy to spot the ball no matter where it lands, whether on land or in water, as our balls also float. For added flair, check out our special edition designs, which bring a unique twist to every play session. SPORTSPET is committed to enhancing your pet's health and happiness. Our ball for dogs are more than just toys—they’re tools for better exercise, mental stimulation, and bonding with your furry friend. With SPORTSPET, you’re giving your dog the best in playtime, ensuring they stay active, engaged, and healthy.
